text: == Events == * Olof, king of Sweden, is baptized by saint Sigfrid. * Bruno of Querfurt and others try to establish a mission among the Prussians. * Oldest known mention of the city of Gundelfingen. * Mohammed II succeeds Hisham II as Caliph of Cordoba. * Unification of Georgia under king Bagrat III. * King Æthelred II (the Unready) orders a new fleet of warships built, organized on a national scale. It is a huge undertaking, but is completed the following year.Stenton, F.M. (1971). Anglo-Saxon England, pp. 381–384. The Oxford History of England. Oxford: Clarendon Press. . == Births == * May 4 - King Henry I of France, French royal (died 1060) == References ==
